title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag! He weighs in on Matt Nagy's next landing spot, the bizarre Texans front office setup, if Kyle Shanahan's bad NFC Championship moments are cause for big picture concern, if the Bengals are actually underrated, and if there's any chance Tom Brady eventually unretires.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
